title: 2004).The classic study of the question of celibacy is Henry C. Lea, History of Sacerdotal Celibacy

title: There is an abundance of excellent studies on civic charity in Italian cities. Among those for Florence the reader will learn much from the seminal essay by Marvin B

note: New Haven and London, 1967). More specifically, David M. D’Andrea has written Civic Christianity in Renaissance Italy: The Hospital of Treviso, 1400–1530 (Woodbridge, Suffolk, 2007).
